title: Why was the Nambu so bad in WW2? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well simple answer it was a luger knock off. I mean this quite literally. I have 2 and they are a pain. Cocking the gun is very annoying and it is easily jammed. All in all the luger and other pistols of there era were much better. It also doesn't help that Japan's economy was tanking cause of the war. Tho I will say it is a “unique” firearm I would recommend lugers to it.
